name: Xiangling
title: Exquisite Delicacy
description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

normal.1: Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.
description.2: Guoba loves to eat spicy food. Problem is, his stomach can't handle something this spicy.

description.0: Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her.
description.1: The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing <pyro>Pyro DMG</pyro> to all opponents in its path.
description.3: There will never be enough heat. Never.

description.0: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.
When Guoba Attack's effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.
When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.
Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <pyro>Pyro RES</pyro> reduced by 15% for 6s.

The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <pyro>AoE Pyro DMG</pyro>.
Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.
For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.
